ApproxsimClient.substrate
Class ColorMap

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.substrate.ColorMap

public class ColorMap
extends Object

This is the color map used in the substrate editor.

          The defined color maps.

Constructor Detail

ColorMap

public ColorMap(ColorChooser colorChooser,
                String scale,
                double minVal,
                double maxVal,
                String cmap)
Creates new color map.

Parameters:
colorChooser - reference to the color selection object.
scale - the actual scale.
minVal - the actual lower bound.
maxVal - the actual upper bound.
cmap - name of the actual color map.
Method Detail

getPanel

public JPanel getPanel()
Returns the color map panel.

setColorMap

public void setColorMap(Color[] cmap)
Update color map table with a given combination of colors. Minimum number of colors is two. Transition between colors is computed by using Hermite interpolation with slope zero.

Parameters:
cmap - array of colors (between 2 and 256).

setColorMapName

public void setColorMapName(String colorMapName)
Sets the name of the color map.

setNrOfDisplayedValues

public void setNrOfDisplayedValues()
Computes the number of displayed values in the color map.

public int getNrOfDisplayedValues()
Returns the number of displayed values.

Computes the values displayed in the color map.

public double[] getDisplayedValues()
Returns the displayed values.

public Color[] getColorTable()

update

public void update()
Updates the color map panel.

update

public void update(String scale,
                   double minVal,
                   double maxVal,
                   String cmap)
Updates the color map values.

Parameters:
scale - new scale.
minVal - new lower bound.
maxVal - new upper bound.
cmap - name of new color map.

getMappingColor

public Color getMappingColor(double value)
Returns the color for the given value. The color is computed according to the actual scale, bounds and color map.

Parameters:
value - the given value.
Returns:
the color matching the value.

updatePointedValue

public void updatePointedValue(Double value,
                               int valPosition)
Updates the label which shows the value pointed in the color map by the mouse cursor.

Parameters:
value - the value pointed by the mouse cursor.
valPosition - position of the mouse cursor.

Sets the maximum value.
